search_pro: Are you looking for a health professional?
choose_user_text: Search and select the user you want to send the post to
profile_screen_received_advice: Contact Sanity's health professionals to obtain your digital personalized programs, your training schedules, your reports and much more!
create_post_advice_body:
Continue" button you can start inserting all the elements and sections you need.
 If you want to continue creating your content later, click on the
and you will be able save your draft!
empty_section:
Use the buttons above to add the items you want:
- Write your text, modify and move it
- Upload your video or a video from YouTube
- Upload your images or shoot a picture
- Register a audio notes
- Sign your section!
empty_section_mobile: Do you want to see the preview of this section? Add the necessary elements and then click the icon on the top right
login_error: Error incorrect login, e-mail or password
email_already_used:
E-mail already registered. Try another e-mail,
 or go to the login screen!
enter_document_description: To give you the permission for publishing contents on Sanity, we must verify the authenticity of the professionals registered on our platform, so we ask you to upload your CV and certificates
error_document:
Something went wrong while uploading your documents.
Please try again later or contact support
signin_description_title:
Enter the requested information to complete your professional profile!

Enter your skills or specializations in the field below to allow people to find you quickly (examples: physiotherapist, psychologist, personal trainer, nutritionist, etc.)
signin_description_body: Tell us about you and your professional career. The description entered will be visible to users when they view your profile (optional)
is_doctor_question: Are you a health professional, doctor or sports trainer?
follow_footer: Follow Sanity on its social media channels
Sanity_angel_desc: Sanity Angel is the ideal package for a single professional or group who have the idea of an exclusive collaboration. Please contact us for more informations by clicking on the link below
subscription_message: You can cancel your subscription when you want in the "Subscription" section
checkout_error_message: There was an error at checkout
subscription_error_message: In case of error, wait a few moments and try the purchase again. For more problems you can contact the support in the appropriate section
attention_message_title: Warning, there are unsaved changes. They will be lost when you exit
pubblish_message: Choose how to publish the program
isempty_error: Upload at least one section to proceed with the publication of the program
delete_sub_body: By clicking on the "Continue" button you will cancel your current subscription. Are you sure you want to proceed?
no_create_post_body:
You have reached the limit of published/draft posts.
If you want to create new contents, go to the "Subscription" section and update to Sanity Pro!
no_followed_post_list: There are no posts from followed users
error_upload: There was an error: please try again!
description_free: Create up to 3 contents that you can already publish or send privately: they will only be visible to those who follow you! When you're ready to verify your profile, you can upload your certificates and contribute to Sanity to be among the recommended professionals!
description_pro: Contribute to Sanity and use the innovative Sanity platform with no limits. You can upgrade if and when you want
description_angel: Are you a company with more than one professional, are you a professional with innovative ideas or do you have a code to enter? Click here!
description_new_model:
Create a new content,
choose your own sections!
description_upload_draft:
If you saved a post as a draft 
and want to upload it, click here!
redeem_text: In this section you can redeem the personalized contents, created just for you: in the section below enter the code that you received, and press enter. You will find your new content in the "Received" section of your profile
redeem_success: You have successfully redeemed the post
redeem_failed: Failed to redeem content: please try again!
text_alert_code: The users will only be able to obtain your generated contents if they have the code. Once registered with Sanity, they will be able to redeem it in the "Redeem code" section of the settings
warning_alert_code: BE CAREFUL! Remember to copy the code before confirming. Once this section is closed, the code will no longer be recoverable
error_dimension_video: Size too big: upload the video to youtube, copy the link and paste it into the 'youtube video' element
draft_error: The draft cannot be generated, please try again
